com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.finders

Class EngineFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.finders.EngineFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PIPFinder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurableEngineFinder

    public class EngineFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements PIPFinder
    EngineFinder implements the PIPFinder interface by maintaining a simple list of registered PIPEngine objects.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

      • getAttributes

        public PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                        PIPEngine exclude,
                        PIPFinder pipFinderParent)
                          throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: PIPFinder
        Retrieves Attributes that based on the given PIPRequest as above. If the PIPFinder invokes the getAttributes method on any child PIPEngines, it should use the supplied PIPFinder rather than itself in the call.
        Specified by:
        getAttributes in interface PIPFinder
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PIPException

                                PIPEngine exclude,
                                PIPFinder pipFinderParent)
                                  throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: PIPFinder
        Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest as above. If the PIPFinder invokes the getAttributes method on any child PIPEngines, it should use the supplied PIPFinder rather than itself in the call.
        Specified by:

      • getAttributes

        public PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                        PIPEngine exclude)
                          throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: PIPFinder
        Retrieves Attributes that based on the given PIPRequest. The PIPResponse may contain multiple Attributes and they do not need to match the PIPRequest. In this way, a PIPFinder may compute multiple related Attributes at once.
        Specified by:
        getAttributes in interface PIPFinder
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest defining which Attributes should be retrieved
        Returns:
        a com.att.research.xacml.pip.PIPResponse with the results of the request
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes.

      • getMatchingAttributes

        public PIPResponse getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                                PIPEngine exclude)
                                  throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: PIPFinder
        Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest. The PIPResponse should only include a single Attribute with AttributeValues whose data type matches the request.
        Specified by:
        getMatchingAttributes in interface PIPFinder
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest defining which Attributes should be retrieved
        Returns:
        a com.att.research.xacml.pip.PIPResponse with the results of the request
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes.
